channel.title: LocalAI on Midori-AI
channel.description: Recent content in LocalAI on Midori-AI

item.title: Install LocalAI Models
item.description: Install a Model from the Midori AI Model Repo Step 1: Start the Midori AI Subsystem Step 2: On the Main Menu, Type 5 to Enter the Backend Program Menu Step 3: On the Backend Program Menu, Type 10 to Enter the LocalAI Model Installer Step 4a: If you have LocalAI installed in the subsystem, skip this step. If you do not have LocalAI installed in the subsystem, the program will ask you to enter the LocalAI docker’s name.
